subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
 
This is to acknowledge receipt of your letter of authorization to change the ownership of your Funds, your power of attorney has been received with Ref:023/024-133/NY.
 
The processing of the change of ownership has commenced, you should therefore advise Mary Hoefer to forward her telephone number and her payment receiving account details to:
 
Email: 
douglasgoldberg6@gmail.com
 
Thanks,
Douglas Goldberg

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Douglas Goldberg,

Thank you for your prompt response. I'm glad to hear that the processing of the change of ownership has commenced. 

I'll be sure to pass on your message to Mary Hoefer. However, could you please clarify what specific account details she needs to provide? Also, is there a particular format or method she should use when sending this information?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Carolyn

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hi

The basic requirement from you at this juncture is to affirm if you
actually authorized her to receive your Funds.
Thanks

Douglas Goldberg
IPCU

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Douglas Goldberg,

Thank you for reaching out. I'm not sure I understand what you're asking. Could you please clarify who "her" is that you're referring to? And what funds are we talking about here? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Carolyn

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hi Carolyn,

Good to read from you, Firstly I want you note that Mrs Carmen Lora Dima
from Neveda and her husband who lived in UK prominently average
happy family, lost her husband according to the details available to me,
during her last moment on earth decided to will her wealth to charity but
decided to choose her inheritor via a means best known to her due to the
fact that she lost her husband 11 years earlier before her demise.

Your name was approved bz her as the legitimate next of kin to her wealth,
Hoefer claimed to have been authorised by you to apply for the approval of
your Funds, the application was followed and holistically honored until all
the paperwork was completed. Surprisingly doubt set in when she decided to
provide her personal account to receive your Funds.

It was at this stage that I personally decided to reach out to you to
ascertain if you indeed authorised her to receive your Funds.

I need your response to enable me to make a decision on how to proceed. but
if you did not authorise her we need to change the approval process and
secure this funds tyzour name to avoid further attempt to divert your
inheritance.
Thanks

Douglas Goldberg.
IPCU:

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hi Douglas,

Wow, that's quite a story! I'm surprised to hear about Mrs. Carmen Lora Dima and her decision. It's sad to hear about her loss though.

As for this Hoefer person, I don't recall authorizing anyone to apply for any funds on my behalf. Could you tell me more about how my name was approved by Mrs. Dima? And what kind of paperwork was completed?

I'm also curious about the process of securing these funds under my name. How does that work exactly?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Carolyn

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Carolyn,

I have handled similar transfer of Funds from individuals like Carmen Lora
Dima, its not new to me that was the reason i suspected the change of
ownership of the previous identity to a new one that prompted my quick
response to that effect. More so, It is my duty to guide zou on the overall
process to secure all relevant paperwork and guide through the process to
secure zour inheritance.

I will also make available the details of Carmen Lora Dima, her pictures as
well as her death certificate and the inherittance worth and paperwork to
help your process of reclaim.

You provide your telephone number.

Douglas Goldberg
IPCU
Thanks

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Douglas Goldberg,

Thank you for your quick response and for offering to guide me through this process. It's reassuring to know that you have experience with similar situations. 

I'm curious about Carmen Lora Dima, could you tell me more about her? How did she come into possession of these funds? And what happened that led to her death?

As for my telephone number, I prefer to keep our conversation here for now if that's okay with you. I find it easier to keep track of information this way.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Carolyn

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
I am Mrs. Carmen Lora Dima from America but not in America now and right
now I am in a hospital. I and my husband were into Real Estate Business and
a Government Contractor before my husband's death on May 25 2014. We were
married for 15 years without a child due to my fibroid problem. And since
my husband's death I have been diagnosed with cancer that I hardly move
around.

Recently, my Doctor told me that I would not last for the next 6 weeks
because the cancer has gotten to a very bad stage. When my husband was
alive he made a deposit of $10,5m USD. Knowing my condition I have decided
to donate this money out for charity purposes. Beloved one Carolyn, I want
to hand over this money to you, I want you to use at least 70% of this
money to visit the orphanages homes, help the poor, sick ones in the
hospital and woman with cancer then take the remaining amount to take care
of your home because every worker deserves his wages.

I took this decision because I don't have any child that will inherit this
money, my relatives are not Good, they are selfish, they frustrated my
marriage life, because of a condition they turned their back on me thinking
nothing good will come out from me since I am SICK AND
CHILDLESS Moreover, my late husband vowed to use our last wealth to help
the less privileged since we have no child.

Whoever gives to the poor lends to the lord and the lord will reward him
for what he has done, pray for my peaceful rest with the lord, when I am
gone.

Thanks and be Blessed.

Mrs. Carmen Lora Dima

THIS WAS A MESSAGE FROM LORA BEFORE HER DEATH:

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Mrs. Carmen Lora Dima,

I'm deeply moved by your story and I'm sorry to hear about your current health condition. It's truly admirable that you want to use your wealth for such noble causes.

Could you please tell me more about the charity work you have in mind? Are there any specific orphanages or hospitals you wish this money to be donated to? Also, could you share more details about how this process will work?

Thank you for considering me for such a significant task. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Carolyn

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Carolyn

The previous message I sent was the last message from Lora Dima, she is
dead and gone, the only legacy left of her is what you do with the wealth
she left in your hands, I so wish you would produently bring her dream to
reality. I have vowed to do everything humanly possible to help you. I will
be forwarding the contact details of the financial institution where these
funds are deposited to commence the Funds reclaim process.
Thanks

Douglas Goldberg
IPCU

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Douglas Goldberg,

I'm sorry to hear about the passing of Lora Dima. It sounds like she was a very generous person. I appreciate your trust in me to carry out her wishes.

Could you please provide more details about this wealth and the process of reclaiming it? I would also like to know more about the financial institution where these funds are deposited.

Thank you for your help in this matter.

Best wishes,
Carolyn

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Carolyn

Will contact the Prudent Depository Ltd; the financial institution where
these funds are deposited to update them and shall inform the PDL
officially that you are willing to reclaim your Funds as the legitimate
next of kin to Lora Dima, I will be concluding on this tomorrow. As soon as
this is done, we shall commence the funds reclaim process accordingly.
Thanks

Douglas Goldberg
IPCU:

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Douglas Goldberg,

Thank you for your message. It's quite surprising to hear about this situation with Lora Dima. I'm curious, how did you come across my contact information and why do you believe I am the next of kin? 

I'm also interested in understanding more about the process of reclaiming these funds. Could you please provide some more details?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Carolyn

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Carolyn

This to inform you officially that your name has been forwarded to the
IJPFA for the processing of your payment approval, therefore you are
requested to forward your personal details as follows:

A) Your address
B) Telephone number
C) Mothers name
The name of any one you intend to present as your Next Of Kin.

Forward the above details to:

Rick Christenson
tac@ijpfa.com

As soon as the above details are received, the approval of this deposited
Funds to your name will commence immediately.
Thanks

Douglas Goldberg
IPCU:

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Douglas Goldberg,

Wow, that sounds like quite an opportunity! I'm flattered that my name has been forwarded to the IJPFA. Could you tell me a bit more about what this organization does? And how did they come across my name?

As for the details you're asking for, I'm a little hesitant to share such personal information over email. Is there another way we could verify my identity?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Carolyn

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Douglas Goldberg,

Thank you for your message. It's quite exciting to hear about this opportunity! I'm curious, could you tell me more about what the IJPFA is? And how did my name get forwarded to them?

Also, I'd love to understand better how this process works. What will happen once my payment approval is processed? 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Carolyn

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
The IJPFA means, International Joint Payment Facilitating Agency, its
paramount duty is to supervise the process of the approval and release of
your Funds, my office is the coordinating body responsible for securing all
required clearance documents to confirm the legitimacy of the origin of
your Funds. As soon as the on-going process is completed, the IPCU and
the IJPFA shall mandate the Prudent Depository Ltd, the financial
institution that will be making the transfer of these Funds to your account.

The details is necessarily required to move further.
Thanks

Douglas Goldberg
IPCU.

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Douglas Goldberg,

Thank you for your detailed explanation about the IJPFA and IPCU. It's fascinating to learn about these processes. Could you please elaborate more on how these agencies work together to secure the clearance documents? And what role does Prudent Depository Ltd play in this process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Carolyn

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Carolyn,

Prudent Depository Ltd (PDL), is the financial institution that will credit
the approved and secured funds by the IPCU and the IJPFA  to your account.
Thanks

IPCU.

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Carolyn,

Thank you for your message. It's interesting to hear about Prudent Depository Ltd PDL and their role in crediting approved and secured funds. I'm not very familiar with these financial terms, could you please explain a bit more about what IPCU and IJPFA are? And how does this process work exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Carolyn

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Carolyn,

Thank you for your message. It's interesting to hear about Prudent Depository Ltd PDL and their role in crediting approved and secured funds. I'm curious, how does the process work with IPCU and IJPFA? Could you provide more details on this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Carolyn
